mapper.insert: insert into user (userName_t, userPassword_t, userLoginName_t, userCode_t, userEmail_t) values (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userLoginName}, #{userCode}, #{userEmail});
mapper.select: select userName_t as userName, userPassword_t as userPassword, userLoginName_t as userLoginName, userCode_t as userCode, userEmail_t as userEmail from user where userEmail_t = #{userLoginInfo} or userLoginName_t = #{userLoginInfo}

select userName_t as userName, userEmail_t as userEmail, userLoginName_t as userLoginName, userCode_t as userCode from user where 1=1
and ((userEmail_t like "%"#{userInfo}"%") or (userLoginName_t like "%"#{userInfo}"%"))
